an5.90:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.90:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukaraniyo viyatto kinkaraniyesu;
an5.90:1.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena divasam atinameti;
an5.90:2.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu samsattho viharati gahatthapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisamsaggena;
an5.90:3.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu akalena gamam pavisati, atidiva patikkamati;
an5.90:4.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—
an5.90:5.2: appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya na nikamalabhi hoti na akicchalabhi na akasiralabhi;
an5.90:5.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.90:6.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti.
an5.90:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraniyo viyatto kinkaraniyesu;
an5.90:6.4: na rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.90:6.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na appamattakena kammena divasam atinameti;
an5.90:7.2: na rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.90:7.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu asamsattho viharati gahatthapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisamsaggena;
an5.90:8.2: na rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.90:8.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na atikalena gamam pavisati, natidiva patikkamati;
an5.90:9.2: na rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.90:9.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—
an5.90:10.2: appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.90:10.3: na rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.90:10.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattati.
an5.90:10.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
